Name Description
Arctic Surge Field becomes Arctic.
Arena Lock Negates field effects.
Arid Surge Field becomes Arid.
Bare Hands Powers up with no hold item.
Blustery Surge Field becomes Blustery.
Calcifate Normal moves become Rock.
Calderize Normal moves become Fire.
Carbonize Normal moves become Steel.
Chlorolize Normal moves become Grass.
Cognizate Normal moves become Psychic.
Cold-Blooded Raises Speed in sunshine.
Combat Surge Field becomes Tense.
Combatize Normal moves become Fighting.
Convection Summons a thunderstorm.
Distillize Normal moves become Water.
Drowsy Aura Causes sleep on contact.
Eerie Surge Field becomes Eerie.
Enchantress Negates items in battle.
Flood Surge Field becomes Drenched.
Floral Surge Field becomes Floral.
Fog Veil Ups evasion in thick fog.
Frostproof Ice and frostbite protection.
Frost Boost Ups Sp. Atk if frostbitten
Fumigate Normal moves become Poison.
Hive Mind Normal moves become Bug.
Humidity Rush Raises Speed in Heat Wave.
Immoralize Normal moves become Dark.
Lifelink May restore HP on contact.
Magma Surge Field is drenched in Magma.
Menace Lowers the foe's Sp. Atk.
Morbid Surge Field becomes Morbid.
Muddy Surge Field becomes Muddy.
Noxious Surge Field becomes Noxious.
Obliviate Confuses on contact.
Phantasmic Swap defenses in battle.
Photon Rush Raises Speed in Solar Wind.
Polluter Summons acid rain.
Power Spore Amplifies status effects.
Primal Surge Field becomes Primal.
Primalize Normal moves become Dragon.
Refraction Powers up beam moves.
Relativist Inverts speed in battle.
Resonance Ups sound move power.
Shrapnel Surge Cover the field in shrapnel.
Singularity Amplify Gravity in battle.
Sludge Rush Raises Speed in Acid Rain.
Solar Being Adds Fire, summons sunlight.
Solar Burst Generates solar wind.
Stagnant Air Summons a heat wave.
Terralate Normal moves become Ground.
Terrorize Normal moves become Ghost.
Unearthly Swap attacks in battle.
Volt Rush Raises Speed in Thunderstorm.
